p: Each individual phyto-constituent was recognized on the basis of its retention time and mass spectrum included in the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST, 2005) and Wiley 2006. Out of 90 identified compounds, most of the compounds were identified from the matrix, and some came from the column itself. The compounds that occupied a negligible percentage of the total areas were discarded. Finally, about 50 compounds with match factor 60% were added in the method.
